name: navNote Offline AI Assistant
featureList: Syncs automatically when connection is restored
Low battery consumption in offline mode
Secure local processing of personal data
requirements: iOS 13+, Android 9+, or modern web browser
description: navNote's revolutionary offline AI assistant provides intelligent task management even without an internet connection. The assistant continues to suggest task prioritization, location-based reminders, and schedule optimization using on-device AI processing.

review.reviewBody: The offline assistant is what sets navNote apart from other task managers. I can rely on it even in areas with poor connectivity.
